name: NetworkCompatibilityToken
desc: An opaque token used to check the networking compatibility between two peers in a multipeer connection.

items.name: static let local: NetworkCompatibilityToken
items.desc: A token containing the local peer’s networking compatibility info.

items.name: func compatibilityWith(NetworkCompatibilityToken) -> NetworkCompatibilityToken.Compatibility
items.desc: Compares network compatibility tokens between the local device and another device.

items.name: enum NetworkCompatibilityToken.Compatibility
items.desc: Indicates whether two devices running RealityKit are compatible and able to connect and sync scenes.

items.name: init(from: Decoder)
items.desc: Creates a new instance from a decoder.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Writes the token’s data into an encoder.
